description: This file defines a mock class ColorMock for testing purposes, which inherits from device::FrontPanelIndicator::ColorImpl and uses Google Mock to simulate its methods.

classes.name: ColorMock
classes.description: A mock class for device::FrontPanelIndicator::ColorImpl used in testing.

methods.name: getInstanceById
methods.description: Mock method to simulate retrieving a Color instance by ID.

methods.name: getInstanceByName
methods.description: Mock method to simulate retrieving a Color instance by name.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Mock method to simulate getting the name of the Color.
